general_advisory: In paddy crop, Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are the critical stages. Cover the rows with dry leaves in sugarcane. Apply sprinkler irrigation. Irrigate maize crop. Spread polythene in irrigation channels. Apply 1g Streptocyclin in tomato and brinjal. Mulch coconut leaves. Cover with paper caps on vegetable seedlings. Harvest fingerlings from shallow ponds if water temperature rises. Yellow stem borer management in paddy. Blast disease management.

advisory: In paddy crop, Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are the critical stages. Cover the rows with dry leaves. Avoid water deficit during critical stages.
Cover the rows with dry leaves in sugarcane. Top-dress with 4% potassium to protect from water scarcity.
High temperature increases water requirement of maize crop. Irrigate the crop. Avoid stagnant water in the field.
High temperature can lead to wilting in tomato. Apply 1g Streptocyclin in root zone.
Install pheromone traps for brinjal shoot and fruit borer. Spray neem-based pesticide at infestation. Use chemical control at necessary intervals.
Mulch coconut leaves around the tree to reduce water loss.
Cover newly planted vegetable seedlings with paper caps during the day.
Harvest fingerlings from shallow ponds if water temperature rises.
